snippet: The national team has the talent to win the World Cup, but it also has weaknesses in critical areas that could spell its downfall.
abstract: Essay by two-time Women's World Cup winner Michelle Akers contends it is difficult to predict whether the United States women's national soccer team will win the World Cup; believes team has what it takes to win if its weaknesses are addressed.
lead_paragraph: The national team has the talent to win the World Cup, but it also has weaknesses in critical areas that could spell its downfall.

headline.print_headline: On Paper, U.S. Women Have Enough
headline.main: On Paper, U.S. Women Have Enough
